member.name: FIND_BY_SID_DATA
member.summary: Contains data for theFSCTL_FIND_FILES_BY_SID control code.

member.name: FIND_BY_SID_DATA.Restart
member.summary: Indicates whether to restart the search. This member should be 1 on first call, so the search will start from the root. For subsequent calls, this member should be zero so the search will resume at the point where it stopped.

member.name: FIND_BY_SID_DATA.Sid
member.summary: A structure that specifies the desired creator owner.
